patthana13.16:4.1: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:4.2: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:4.3: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:4.4: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:4.5: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:4.6: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:4.7: Maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:5.1: Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa … pe … avigate pañcatiṃsa.
